comment: "Disassociation" = block button The majority of Gabbers have already made it clear we don't want a block/censorship button. Every time Andrew has posed that option he got a widely negative reaction from people. Gab is going to start sucking and get super boring once everyone starts blocking each other, limiting interaction and debate.
